description: Certificate of Lawfulness (Existing) for ground floor launderette.
decision_conditions:
The application has been refused as use of land for a 'laundrette' is a sui generis use under the Land Use Gazetter, which requires planning permission.

This refusal does not prejudice any future applications for planning permission for the use of the land for a laundrette.

The applicant is encouraged to make a new planning applicaion for the use of the land.

To assist applicants the Local Planning Authority has produced policies and written guidance, all of which is available on the Councilâ€™s website. 

A pre-planning application advice service is also offered and encouraged.

No pre-application discussions were entered into. On receipt, the scheme did not comply with policy or guidance. 

The LPA delivered the decision in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the NPPF.

The LPA invites the applicant to enter into a collaborative pre-planning application discussion process to assist in the preparation of a new planning application.
